name: Path to Nordeus
description:
I was starting game development and I wanted to have something to show when I apply for job/internship/whatever instead of a 1-page-5-sentences-no-experience-CV and a generic cover letter. So it got to me one night to make this - to compress road-so-far in programming (web -> game dev) to a short little story and few levels, game-jam like project, ASAP time wise. 

Not even a five minute talk :D but hopefully it can inspire someone else.

Don't get mad, first, boss, The Snake, hold D right away but when you drink the pot, wait a second then continue with D.

Enjoy! :)
